message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I'm thinking of a price of $18000 for it. Would you like to make an offer or accept this price?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not quite ready to go as low as $14000. I'm thinking of a price of $16000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but $16000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I still need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $15500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15500 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Can you consider that?
